item.title: What's Chipmunk?
item.description: Chipmunk is a chiptune sound tracker for Windows, MacOS and Linux. Music for retro systems like Commodore 64, MSX, Game Boy, Sega Genesis, etc. can be composed using Chipmunk from a Windows, MacOS or Linux desktop computer. Chipmunk emulates the original sound hardware of retro systems. Music produced can be exported as a wave file or as a VGM file to play it directly using original hardware. Project status Chipmunk is in an early development stage, no public build is available yet.
